Key Match Events: India won by 8 wickets (with 46 balls remaining)
Rohit Sharma scored his 30th T20I fifty
Rohit Sharma hit two trademark pulls off successive balls for his 599th and 600th sixes in international cricket
Rishabh Pant hit three sixes and two fours while scoring an unbeaten 36 off 26
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch was treacherous and inconsistent, with batters from both teams taking body blows
India's selection of four fast bowlers including Hardik Pandya, and two spin-bowling allrounders proved useful
The packed pace attack extracted seam movement and up-and-down bounce right through an Ireland innings
Others: Arshdeep Singh, Mohammed Siraj, Jasprit Bumrah and Hardik Pandya picked up 8 for 81 between them
Harry Tector was hit on the glove and the thigh pad
Lorcan Tucker was bowled trying to drive a nip-backer from Hardik
Barry McCarthy was caught and bowled by an Axar Patel ball
Gareth Delany's risk-taking came off in a 14-ball 26 that carried Ireland to 96
